name: comment-box
description: Command that transforms one or multiple lines of text into a comment box.

commentBox.textAlignment.description:
When using a fixed width, controls how the text should be aligned. Can be: 
'- center' or 
'- left'.

commentBox.extendSelection.description: When 'true' the whole line is replaced, not just the selected part.

commentBox.commentStartToken.description: Characters that start a multi-line comment for your current language.

commentBox.commentEndToken.description: Characters that end a multi-line comment for your current language.

commentBox.topEdgeToken.description: Characters that are used to draw top edge of the box.

commentBox.bottomEdgeToken.description: Characters that are used to draw bottom edge of the box.

commentBox.leftEdgeToken.description: Characters that are used to draw left edge of the box.

commentBox.rightEdgeToken.description: Characters that are used to draw right edge of the box.

commentBox.boxWidth.description: The width of the comment box. When set to 0, it will automatically pick the smallest possible value.

commentBox.fillingToken.description: When using a fixed width, controls the characters that are used to fill the extra space available.

commentBox.textToEdgeSpace.description: The amount of spaces (empty characters) that are used to separate the text from the side edges.
